title: Reported Speech - Yes-no Questions 2
instructions: Put the sentences into reported speech.
exa:
Do you need this pen?
He asked if I needed that pen.
Are you sleeping?
She asked me if I was sleeping.

contents.longsent: Are you talking to your mother?
alters: if I was talking to my mother.

contents.longsent: Is this dog barking at us?
alters: if this dog was barking at us.

contents.longsent: Was the boss looking for Tom?
alters: if the boss had been looking for Tom.
if I had stolen his umbrella.

contents.longsent: Can you lend me some money so that I can travel home?
contents.starter: A guy in the street asked me...
alters: if I could lend him some money so that he could travel home.

contents.longsent: Will they tell me if passed the exam?
alters: if they would tell me if I had passed the exam.

contents.longsent: Are we going to get a pay rise?
alters: if we were going to get a pay rise.
